video_prompt: Futuristic cityscape. Flying vehicles with shifting glow traverse towering buildings. Neon signs flicker and reflect on wet surfaces. Figures move on elevated walkways and ground level, amidst bustling activity and crisscrossing utility lines. Dynamic high-tech metropolis.
image_prompt: A vibrant, futuristic cyberpunk/neo-Tokyo cityscape at night, teeming with neon lights and towering buildings. Two large, glowing disc-shaped flying vehicles (one golden, one green) in the upper sky above silhouetted skyscrapers. Dense, multi-layered urban environment below, packed with illuminated signs (pinks, blues, greens, yellows, oranges, East Asian characters), reflecting on wet streets. Elevated walkways and bridges connect structures, with tiny figures on streets and moving platforms below. Utility lines crisscross the scene. High vantage point, energetic and overwhelming atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Flying vehicles continually traverse the skyline, their glows shifting and pulsing as they weave through structures. Neon signs rapidly flicker, causing their reflections to ripple and distort across wet ground. Figures actively flow and converge on multi-level walkways, forming a persistent, bustling human current. The high-tech environment itself visibly pulsates with ceaseless, dynamic energy.
